fry: Fix color multiplier applied incorrectly for items.
fry: OBJ loader: fixed another whitespace-related issue; removed unused
property to switch between OpenGL-style and DirextX-style model UVs; fixed normals - they are now correct in-world, still a bit strange for the items; fixed normals a little bit for B3D models too.
